body:
You can think of OpenStudio as another interface for E+. What makes OpenStudio unique is that it has an API and also integration to Radiance. OpenStudio component converts the osm (Open Studio Model) file to and idf file and uses E+ to run the energy simulation. It's just a different workflow to create the model.



Their website should be the best place to get started: [http://nrel.github.io/OpenStudio-user-documentation/](http://nrel.github.io/OpenStudio-user-documentation/)
